title: 普通用户warp权限怎么设置？
author: lclclcqqwwee
txt_content:
普通用户warp权限怎么设置？
在哪设置       输入什么指令？

replies.author: a1466138924
replies.txt_content: warp应该这个不需要权限吧！

replies.author: lclclcqqwwee
replies.txt_content:
a1466138924 发表于 2014-8-19 13:31
warp应该这个不需要权限吧！
普通用户无法用warp传送

replies.author: jiuerd
replies.txt_content:
lclclcqqwwee 发表于 2014-8-19 13:40
普通用户无法用warp传送
mangaddp 组 essentials.warp

相关权限节点:
delwarpessentials.delwarpAllow access to the /delwarp command.setwarpessentials.setwarpAllow access to the /setwarp command.setwarpessentials.warp.overwrite.*Allows overwriting of all existing warps.setwarpessentials.warp.overwrite.[warpname]Allows overwriting of existing warps.warpessentials.warpAllow access to the /warp command.warpessentials.warp.listSpecifies whether you can view warp list with /warp.warpessentials.warp.otherplayersAllows warping another player.warpessentials.warps.*Allows access to all warps.warpessentials.warps.[warpname]If you have per-warp-permission set to true in the config.yml then you can limit what warps players can use. This also controls what players would see with /warp.

replies.author: losew
replies.txt_content:
jiuerd 发表于 2014-8-19 13:59
mangaddp 组 essentials.warp

相关权限节点:
补充一下。最后一条需要在essentials的config文本中开启per-warp-permission（每个地标传送权限）来启用。

replies.author: lclclcqqwwee
replies.txt_content:
losew 发表于 2014-8-20 17:57
补充一下。最后一条需要在essentials的config文本中开启per-warp-permission（每个地标传送权限）来启用 ...
不行啊上面显示  no permission！
怎么办啊

replies.author: losew
replies.txt_content:
lclclcqqwwee 发表于 2014-8-22 16:41
不行啊上面显示  no permission！
怎么办啊
是玩家使用显示no permission吗==按照上面2L的给就行
